CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'D') , 7,
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'W'), ISPICKVAL(Frequency_Interval__c, '2')) ,0.5 ,
IF( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'W') , Final_Frequency__c ,
IF(ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'M'), 1,
IF( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'Y') , 0 ,
0 )))))
CustomField.label: Pricing Frequency Count
